text: @Marsha34 TJ Max clearly demonstrates their lack of understanding as a Corporate Citizen with the community. 1. Place big red SALE signs everywhere, 2. Pack the ppl into the store, 3. Create a buyer frenzy, 4. Wait for next Covid19 wave to hit the area, Repeat again and again.
